sorry for the lag; anyhow, try to install with acpi disabled
at the boot, add noacpi to the boot command
just tap the space bar and it'll stop the clock, then you can add option to the boot command ... i don't remember what it says (been a long time)
yes. that's it. hit F6, then add option (noacpi)
you can try this one, acpi=off, also
fwiw, i have one laptop that gave me a hard time, such as install stops @ 28%, so i issued a command with acpi=off and it went all the way.
